price: 99. Dijo Abraham: “Emigraré hacia (donde me ordene) mi Señor; Él me guiará”.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
